attributes.additional_details:
I believe that police force should ensure that:
1. Every police officer is armed with a minimum of a Glock 17.
2. Use 9mm carbines when guarding landmarks or important buildings such as the parliament.
3. Two officers need to be guarding in cooperation with each other at any one time.
Hopefully, if these measures are implemented our police officers will be safer.
attributes.background: PC Keith Palmer died as a hero, had he been armed with a weapon he could have been able to defend himself.
